Based on the preferences cues given, I would recommend watching "Total Recall" (2005) first.

"Total Recall" stars Paul Verhoeven as Dr. Michael Crichton, a scientist who becomes involved with an operation known as Project Recall.

In this operation, Dr. Crichton and a team of scientists are tasked with designing a new type of memory implant for people who have suffered amnesia after a serious accident or trauma.

The goal of the project is to create a device that will allow people who have suffered amnesia after a serious accident or trauma to regain their lost memories.

Throughout the film, Dr. Crichton and his team of scientists are faced with numerous challenges as they work towards achieving their goal of creating a device that will allow people who have suffered amnesia after a serious accident or trauma to regain their lost memories.
